name: Emimei's Duffel
flavorText: "Emimei was rumored to be the offspring of the famed fletcher Cirri. Possibly even more talented than her father, she discovered a way to integrate a superior ignition system into demon hunter bola weapons. Exert enough pressure on a bola's spike and the explosive charge within triggers, causing the bola to detonate upon impact with a target." -The Craft of War by Diadra the Scholar
flavorTextHtml: "Emimei was rumored to be the offspring of the famed fletcher Cirri. Possibly even more talented than her father, she discovered a way to integrate a superior ignition system into demon hunter bola weapons. Exert enough pressure on a bola's spike and the explosive charge within triggers, causing the bola to detonate upon impact with a target." -The Craft of War by Diadra the Scholar

secondary.textHtml: Bolas now explode instantly and deal 169% increased damage. (Demon Hunter Only) [150 - 175]%
